entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
